attributes.additional_details: It wouldn’t cause any more problems, I think it could be used in a way to solve problems, keep it illegal for when driving, but legalise it in general, less knife crime, less street abuse!
attributes.background: Legalise cannabis, now that medical cannabis is legal, the government should legalise cannabis in general.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/300475
